Class SlickEntity

java.lang.Object
  de.myreality.dev.chronos.models.NodeObject<Entity>
      de.myreality.dev.chronos.models.Entity

All Implemented Interfaces:
Bounding, Scriptable, java.io.Serializable
public class SlickEntity
extends Entity

This file is part of Chronos (Myreality Game Development Toolkit). Chronos is licenced under GNU LESSER GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE (Version 3)

For more information visit http://dev.my-reality.de/chronos

Entity especially for slick games. Can only be used in combination with Slick (http://slick.cokeandcode.com)

Since:
1.0
Author:
Miguel Gonzalez
